job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: strongJob DescriptionbrbrstrongstrongThe RolebrbrstrongAre you interested in joining a fastpaced organization where you can make an immediate impact on the business Do you want to be an Artificial Intelligence AIMachine Learning ML advocate using data to answer important questions and shape strategy for leadership You can be a part of the Fidelity Technology that constantly pushes the potential of data to drive the business forwardbrbrThe Fidelity Fund amp Investment Operations FFIO technology team is looking for a strongData Scientist strongto join their Business Process Automation and Analytics team in Westlake TX This role will be responsible for developing and delivering Data Science solutions on multiple business automation initiatives using analytical platforms Additionally the person will be responsible for collaborating with key partners eg business unit technology teams Data architecture analytics designers in the implementation of data science solutionsbrbrstrongThe Expertise And Skills You BringbrstrongulliMinimum Masters Degree in Engineering Computer Science Mathematics Computational Statistics Operations Research Machine Learning or related technical fieldslili23 years of prior work experience as a data scientist delivered 23 Machine Learning projects for business partnerliliProficiency in the entire Data Modeling life cycle  From exploratory data analysis to data cleaning to Feature Engineering to Model Building and Validation Operationalization and Scalability of scientific techniques and establishing decision strategiesliliExperience developing supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms regression decision treesrandom forest neural networks NLP feature selectionreduction clustering parameter tuning etcliliExperience in projects involving large scale multidimensional databases complex business infrastructure and crossfunctional teamsliliProgramming skills in Python SQL RliliHands on experience on using AWS framework is a plusliliExperience in the financial domain and familiarity with financial models are highly desirableliliAbility to partner closely with a diverse set of business stakeholders to identify needs and deliver AIML solutionsliliAbility to gather and analyze large amounts of information expeditiouslyliliProven expertise synthesizing and presenting researchtechnical findings to diverse audiencesliliValidated skills in algorithm development and predictive modelingliliAbility to discover new opportunities where analytical techniques can be leveraged for solving business problemsliliBringing an outstanding datadriven mindset to a variety of business problemsliliEnsuring that AIML use cases are optimally identified prioritized and executedliliCollaborating and coordinating with other team membersbrbrliulstrongThe TeambrbrstrongFidelity Fund amp Investment Operations FFIO technology team crafts and maintains technology solutions and products that enable FFIO to provide accounting and investment management support services to Fidelity businesses and fund shareholders As part of FFIO Business Automation and Analytics team is responsible for providing thoughtleadership in implementation of data science and analytical deliverables for improving operational excellence and delivering business operations insightsbrbrFFIO delivery teams are organized as small multifunctional squads delivering specific business amp technology goals defined by the TribesbrbrstrongCertificationsbrbrstrongCompany OverviewbrbrAt Fidelity Investments our customers are at the heart of everything we do As a privately held company with a rich 75year history our mission has remained the same since our founding emto strengthen the financial
